data.text: Shocker. Ground stop in @LGAairport   Get your shit together. Not like this is a surprise travel day. #bullshit #Someofushavetowork. Thank you to @Delta for keeping us updated on the ground as we sit in the plane.

data.text: Get ahead of this issue, @Delta and create a “Family Section” at the back of your flights. Or create clear policies that remove disruptive children/families from flights. “Toddler ‘running wild' on an eight-hour flight.” https://t.co/a9hz1aSmxq

urls.title: Parents slammed after video of their toddler 'running wild' on an eight-hour flight is debated
urls.description: Flying with small children can be challenging, but the internet is calling out the parents of kids who disturb fellow passengers.

data.text: so @Delta second time ordering a "vegan" (vgml) meal that was served absolutely ICE cold and time inappropriate. Lunch meal served for breakfast, why? You really need to find some caterers! At this point I'm just going to give up on your meals completely! Care to explain??

data.text: So the 72hr upgrade window for @Delta gold medallion status isn’t really a thing? I’m within an hour of check-in and still not on the list. Also paid for premium select but only main cabin avail on 1 leg.
